description: Erection of hip to gable and rear L shaped dormer roof extensions, window to side gable and installation of 1 no. rooflight to front roof slope
decision_conditions: The proposed extension and alterations are not considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under schedule 2, Part 1, Class B.1b and B.2c of the Town and County Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)

Your attention is drawn to the need to comply with the relevant provisions of the Building Regulations, the Building Acts and other related legislation.  These cover such works as  - the demolition of existing buildings, the erection of a new building or structure, the extension or alteration to a building, change of use of buildings, installation of services, underpinning works, and fire safety/means of escape works.  Notice of intention to demolish existing buildings must be given to the Council's Building Control Service at least 6 weeks before work starts.  A completed application form together with detailed plans must be submitted for approval before any building work is commenced.

Proposal Description - This has been amended for clarity. Please confirm if you agree, or amend if you disagree with the following description: "Erection of single storey rear extension, and hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 3nos. front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion"
